game.name: NodalBastion
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 미니멀 인크리멘탈 게임에서 마지막 AI 코어를 지켜라. 자원을 관리하고 네트워크를 업그레이드하며 강력한 스킬을 사용하라. 인류의 맹공격에 맞서 싸워라!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Defend the last AI core in a minimalist incremental game as you manage resources, upgrade your network, and unleash powerful skills. Resist humanity’s onslaught!
